03:06.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Atheros Communications Inc. AR2417 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5007G 802.11bg] [168c:001d] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Accton Technology Corporation Device [1113:b203]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 22
        Memory at f9bf0000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
        Kernel modules: ath5k

ath5k: phy0: Atheros AR2417 chip found (MAC: 0xf0, PHY: 0x70)
